response.overview: Sonny: 5'9", 200#, 29 yo Eric: 5'10", 200#, 32 yo Sonny Markham has some great wrestling skills. That skill keeps Eric Evans off balance and wrapped up virtually the whole way through this video. And when it is all over, when Eric is thoroughly beaten and cries his submission for the final time, he's fucked as a loser should be. It's a continuous, humiliating squash job for Eric Evans. Sonny is relentless. Eric is folded, bent, spread, and lifted. Crotch spreads are one of Sonny's favorites. Sonny has massive, muscular thighs, and when he gets Eric's head between them - it is definitely crush time. At one point Markham yanks Eric's jockstrap into his ass crack, strips him, and stuffs the jock into his mouth. There is a part of Eric that is enjoying this humiliation. He is enjoying Sonny's dominance, the muscle to muscle contact. He gets all of that and much, much more. Sonny puts a boot on Eric's chest and gives us all a victory pose at the end of the video. Great stuff from BG.
response.title: Fantasy Fight 17
